page.title: 05LOUGHBOROUGH MARKET
page.content: The Loughborough Market is held in the town centre on Thursdays and Saturdays Most people come to the market more than once a week.A lot of the people who come live within two miles of Loughborough but some people come from more than 5 miles away. Most people get to market by car but quite alot walk it.Most people come to the market to buy{fruit and vegetables}and household goods.The thing that most people like is the atmosphere and the character of the market and they like the old tradition.One of the disadvantages of shopping there is that you cannot get everything you want and it can be dirty. People would rather have the market indoors in winter because of the rain and snow. In the summer the people would rather have it outdoors because of the nice weather.
